label: 徳政
本: Terms and Concepts in Japanese Medieval History . Journal of Japanese Studies . 1983
説明文: Also Tokuseirei [徳政令]. A general term meaning governmental policy or reform. Later, a bakufu order limiting or nullifying commercial transactions involvong lands that had been lost or sold by housemen. In the Muromachi period, a general term for any decree, civil or military, that cancelled debts or sales. (See Mass, Kamakura Bakufu)
